task.title: Setting a default server
task.shortdesc: A default server is the server that you want to use when a project has more than one server defined.

step.info: The pop-up menu for this project appears.
The Server pane appears on the right.

step.cmd: Under the Default server list, select the server that you want to become the default server.
Click Apply and then OK to save your changes and close the Properties window.
